content: this pattern is a baby version similar to my popular adult hats spruce 1 and where the forest meets the sky 2 if you knit this version and post as a project i ll also send you those for free the hat can be made with regular stranded knitting or ladderback jackard the latter gives great results for high contrast wool but requires a bit more work i have included a plain chart and a chart detailing the ladderback jackard stitches if you re unsure about ladderback jackard this video is the best i ve seen for detailing the technique https //youtu be/iltugy_m-ds si=uxjr_8ctsd7hff0w 3 one size hat is made 30cm circumference to fit baby hat is made with fingering yarn a dark 15g / 53m / 57yds b light 15g / 53m / 57yds 2 5mm us 1 5 and 2 5mm us 2 5 needles required 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spruce-16 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/where-the-forest-meets-the-sky 3 https //youtu be/iltugy_m-ds si=uxjr_8ctsd7hff0w
